sources.title: Drifter, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Drifter (1932) WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: William Farnum, Noah Beery, Phyllis Barrington
 Director: William A. O'Connor

 A man known as The Drifter returns home to his cabin in the woods and winds up getting involved with an escaped convict, a gunfighter, lumber company rivals, mysterious family ties and murder!

metadata.Plot: A man known as The Drifter returns home to his cabin in the woods and winds up getting involved with an escaped convict, a gunfighter, lumber company rivals, mysterious family ties and murder.
metadata.Actors: William Farnum, Noah Beery, Phyllis Barrington
